text.tspan: On the CBMIA board, 4 switches (SW1 -> SW4) allows the user to choose the path of the JTAG chain.
If the switches are in position JTAG (up), both the flash memory and the FPGA are accessible from the JTAG connector.
If the switches are in position PCI (down), only the flash memory can be accessed from the PCI bus (trough the PLX chip).
When the board are installed in front end, the switches MUST be in PCI position.
